SELECT po.pid,po.person_nickname,po.person_image,po.z_zhubo,po.oid,g.gid,po.pos FROM ( SELECT p.pid,p.person_nickname,p.person_image,p.z_zhubo,o.oid,o.o_createtime,o.o_money,COUNT(o.oid) pos FROM p_person p LEFT JOIN o_order_z o ON p.pid = o.pid WHERE p.z_zhubo = 1 GROUP BY p.pid) po LEFT JOIN g_service g ON po.pid = g.pid WHERE po.z_zhubo = 1
AND g.gid = #{gid}
and po.o_createtime > date_sub(now(), interval #{hotday} day)
GROUP BY po.pid order by pos DESC limit 0,3

SELECT po.pid,po.person_nickname,po.person_image,po.z_zhubo,po.oid,po.oms FROM ( SELECT p.pid,p.person_nickname,p.person_image,p.z_zhubo,o.oid,o.o_createtime,o.o_money,o.o_service,sum(o_money) oms FROM p_person p LEFT JOIN o_order o ON p.pid=o.pid WHERE p.z_zhubo=0 GROUP BY p.pid) po LEFT JOIN g_service g ON po.pid=g.pid WHERE po.z_zhubo=0
AND po.o_service=(select g_name from g_service where gid = #{gid} group by g_name)
and po.o_createtime > date_sub(now(), interval #{magnateday} day)
GROUP BY po.pid order by oms DESC limit 0,3
